results.title: Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with ventilator-associated pneumonia: a randomized clinical trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS AND RELEVANCE: In adults with suspected @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Ventilator_Associated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053717 @@@VAP@@@, adjunctive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy compared with placebo did not improve day-28 survival.

citations.NLM: Papazian L, Roch A, Charles PE, Penot-Ragon C, Perrin G, Roulier P, Goutorbe P, Lefrant JY, Wiramus S, Jung B, Perbet S, Hernu R, Nau A, Baldesi O, Allardet-Servent J, Baumstarck K, Jouve E, Moussa M, Hraiech S, Guervilly C, Forel JM, STATIN-VAP Study Group. Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with ventilator-associated pneumonia: a randomized clinical trial. JAMA. 2013 Oct 23;310(16):1692-700. PMID: 24108510
citations.BibTeX: @article{24108510, title={Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with ventilator-associated pneumonia: a randomized clinical trial.}, author={Papazian L and Roch A and Charles PE and Penot-Ragon C and Perrin G and Roulier P and Goutorbe P and Lefrant JY and Wiramus S and Jung B and Perbet S and Hernu R and Nau A and Baldesi O and Allardet-Servent J and Baumstarck K and Jouve E and Moussa M and Hraiech S and Guervilly C and Forel JM and STATIN-VAP Study Group}, journal={JAMA}, volume={310}, number={16}, pages={1692-700}}

results.title: Long-term administration of simvastatin reduces ventilator-induced lung injury and upregulates heme oxygenase 1 expression in a rat model.
results.text_hl: ...BACKGROUND: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Ventilator_Associated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053717 @@@ventilator@@@-induced @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ and is regularly used in clinical practice.

citations.NLM: Zhao W, Song H, Huo W. Long-term administration of simvastatin reduces ventilator-induced lung injury and upregulates heme oxygenase 1 expression in a rat model. J Surg Res. 2015 Dec;199(2):601-7. PMID: 26163326
citations.BibTeX: @article{26163326, title={Long-term administration of simvastatin reduces ventilator-induced lung injury and upregulates heme oxygenase 1 expression in a rat model.}, author={Zhao W and Song H and Huo W}, journal={J Surg Res}, volume={199}, number={2}, pages={601-7}}
